snippet: Bill Hwang, once a star at Tiger Management, entered a guilty plea on behalf of his fund, Tiger Asia, admitting to wire fraud by the firm.
abstract: Bill Hwang, once a star at Tiger Management, entered a guilty plea on behalf of his fund, Tiger Asia, admitting to wire fraud by the firm.

headline.main: Guilty Plea for One of Julian Robertson's 'Tiger Cub' Funds
headline.print_headline: Tiger Asia Founder, Onetime Star, Admits to His Fund’s Improper Trading
